name: Muffled Warfare
detailed_description:
From the creators of Stifled comes Muffled Warfare, a brave new entry into the echolocation-game genre.

Muffled Warfare is a multiplayer first-person echolocation shooter where everyone is blind and uses sounds to SEE, SHOOT and SILENCE their competition. You've heard of that blind superhero that dresses up like a devil in red right? Yea, think that, but with guns.

Join us on Discord and help us make this game!


  • ECHOLOCATION - use sound to SEE, SHOOT and SILENCE the competition.
  • STEALTH MECHANICS - Fade into the darkness that is silence.
  • MULTIPLAYER MAYHEM - Silence or be Silenced?
  • FAST-PACED ACTION - There was too much walking in Stifled.
  • OUTLANDISH WEAPONS - Because regular weapons are, meh.
  • FUTURE-GEN AI - Patent Pending BI (Burden Intelligence)
  • SKINS - We know you love'em
  • 4K HDR GRAPHICS - Gotta get in on them buzzwords.
  • COLORS - Like, 4 of them.

Like we said, It wasn't a joke.

short_description: Muffled Warfare is a multiplayer first-person echolocation shooter where everyone is blind and uses sounds to SEE, SHOOT and SILENCE their competition. You've heard of that blind superhero that dresses up like a devil in red right? Yea, think that, but with guns.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is the lowest stats we've tested with. Please let us know if you have a weaker machine!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 970 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
